Traveling

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Settings Home

Wiki Home

Traveling in the world of peragro can be as fun as you want it to be. The basic way of traveling is moving.Traveling can also be done on Mountables , Vehicles or with Special Equipment


Moving

See Movement

Mountables

The following mountables are generally known:

  • Horses
  • Nug'var

There are more mountables in the world of peragro. It is up to you to discover them all

Vehicles

The following vehicles are currently available:

Carts

There are carts of various sizes available for rental and purchase. Carts require a horse as most are too heavy for a person to adequately pull. There are small two wheeled carts available however that can be pulled by an average person. Rented carts usually are rented as a horse and cart pair, and people often sell them together, however it is possible to by them separately.
